title: Merry Christmas, Princess Dinosaur!
description: It's Christmas Eve.The presents are wrapped.The tree is decorated.The stockings are up.Santa's milk and cookiesare set out.And Princess Dinosaur andher friends are fast asleep.Ssshh...All is quiet and peaceful atPrincess Dinosaur's house.Only kidding!!!!! There is absolutely, positively, definitely, and completely nothing quiet and peaceful about Christmas with Princess Dinosaur! But a merry, merry Christmas it most certainly will be!
author: Jill Kastner
